pytealutils.transaction package

Submodules

pytealutils.transaction.inner_transactions.axfer(receiver: <TealType.uint64: 0>, asset_id: <TealType.uint64: 0>, amt: <TealType.uint64: 0>) → pyteal.Expr
pytealutils.transaction.inner_transactions.pay(receiver: <TealType.uint64: 0>, amt: <TealType.uint64: 0>) → pyteal.Expr
pytealutils.transaction.transaction.assert_common_checks(idx: <TealType.uint64: 0>)

Calls all txn checker assert methods

Note: This doesn’t mean the transaction is “safe” but these are common things to check for any transaction see https://developer.algorand.org/docs/get-details/dapps/avm/teal/guidelines/ for more details

pytealutils.transaction.transaction.assert_min_fee(idx: <TealType.uint64: 0>)

Checks that the fee for a transaction is exactly equal to the current min fee

pytealutils.transaction.transaction.assert_no_asset_close_to(idx: <TealType.uint64: 0>) → pyteal.Expr

Checks that the asset_close_to field is empty, Assert if it is set

pytealutils.transaction.transaction.assert_no_close_to(idx: <TealType.uint64: 0>) → pyteal.Expr

Checks that the close_remainder_to field is empty, Assert if it is set

pytealutils.transaction.transaction.assert_no_rekey(idx: <TealType.uint64: 0>) → pyteal.Expr

Checks that the rekey_to field is empty, Assert if it is set
